nodes.text: Attahox was a world in the Expansion Region near Daalang.
During the Great Sith War, Krath came from Ulda Frav and conquered the planet, from which they moved to Nixor.

An impoverished garbage planet, it was a source of phosovane salts used in painkillers. The planet was controlled by the exalted Torgaigne syndicate. In general, it was used for centuries by criminal gangs as a hideout and cache.
During the Clone Wars, the planet was located within Separatist space.
